column4: I have another question: a few months ago, I bought some two 512 Mo memory modules  to extend my laptop's memory to 1Go, but my computer doesn't seem to be aware that said memory modules are 512 Mo instead of the former 256
is there anything I should do to correct that?
check the laptop makers bios/forums/homepage there may be updates.. or it may be a limit of the laptops design
theoretically, the limit is 1Go, but you're right, I should check out there
